columns.name: ApplicationNames
columns.description: List of application names used or related to the event

columns.name: DeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in Microsoft Defender for Endpoint

columns.name: DeviceName
columns.description: Fully qualified domain name(FQDN) of the device

columns.name: AadDeviceId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the device in Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: IsManagedDevice
columns.description: Indicates if the device is managed by the organization (True) or not (False)

columns.name: DlpPolicyMatchInfo
columns.description: Information around the list of data loss prevention (DLP) policies matching this event

columns.name: DlpPolicyEnforcementMode
columns.description: Indicates the Data Loss Prevention policy that was enforced; value can be: 0 (None), 1 (Audit), 2 (Warn), 3 (Warn and bypass), 4 (Block), 5 (Allow)

columns.name: DlpPolicyRuleMatchInfo
columns.description: Details of the data loss prevention (DLP)  rules that matched with this event; in JSON array format

columns.name: FileRenameInfo
columns.description: Details of the file (file name and extension) before this event

columns.name: PhysicalAccessPointId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the physical access point

columns.name: PhysicalAccessPointName
columns.description: Name of the physical access point

columns.name: PhysicalAccessStatus
columns.description: Status of physical access, whether it succeeded or failed

columns.name: PhysicalAssetTag
columns.description: Tag assigned to the asset as configured in Microsoft Insider Risk Management global settings

columns.name: RemovableMediaManufacturer
columns.description: Manufacturer name of the removable device

columns.name: RemovableMediaModel
columns.description: Model name of the removable device

columns.name: RemovableMediaSerialNumber
columns.description: Serial number of the removable device

columns.name: TeamsChannelName
columns.description: Name of the Teams channel

columns.name: TeamsChannelType
columns.description: Type of the Teams channel

columns.name: TeamsTeamName
columns.description: Name of the Teams team

columns.name: UserAlternateEmails
columns.description: Alternate emails or aliases of the user

columns.name: AccountUpn
columns.description: User principal name (UPN) of the account

columns.name: AccountObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the account in Microsoft Entra ID

columns.name: Department
columns.description: Name of the department that the account user belongs to

columns.name: SourceCodeInfo
columns.description: Details of the source code repository involved in the event

columns.name: CcPolicyMatchInfo
columns.description: Details of the Communications Compliance policy matches for this event; in JSON array format

columns.name: IPAddress
columns.description: IP addresses of the clients on which the activity was performed; can contain multiple IPs if related to Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps alerts

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: Date and time when the event was recorded

columns.name: DeviceSourceLocationType
columns.description: Indicates the type of location where the endpoint signals originated from; values can be: 0 (Unknown), 1 (Local), 2 (Remote), 3 (Removable), 4 (Cloud), 5 (File share)

columns.name: DeviceDestinationLocationType
columns.description: Indicates the type of location where the endpoint signals connected to; values can be: 0 (Unknown), 1 (Local), 2 (Remote), 3 (Removable), 4 (Cloud), 5 (File share)

columns.name: IrmPolicyMatchInfo
columns.description: Details of Insider Risk Management policy matches for the content involved in the event; in JSON array format

columns.name: UnallowedUrlDomains
columns.description: Websites or service URLs involved in this event that is configured as Unallowed in Insider Risk Management global settings

columns.name: ExternalUrlDomains
columns.description: Websites or service URLs involved in this event that is classified as External in Insider Risk Management global settings

columns.name: UrlDomainInfo
columns.description: Details about the websites or service URLs involved in the event

columns.name: SourceUrlDomain
columns.description: Domain where the device and email signals originated

columns.name: TargetUrlDomain
columns.description: Domain where the content was shared with or the user has browsed to

columns.name: EmailAttachmentCount
columns.description: Number of email attachments

columns.name: EmailAttachmentInfo
columns.description: Details of email attachments; in JSON array format

columns.name: InternetMessageId
columns.description: Public-facing identifier for the email or Teams message that is set by the sending email system

columns.name: NetworkMessageId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the email, generated by Microsoft 365

columns.name: EmailSubject
columns.description: Subject of the email

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the object that the recorded action was applied to, in case of files, it includes the extension

columns.name: ObjectName
columns.description: Name of the object that the recorded action was applied to, in case of files, it includes the extension

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Type of object, such as a file or a folder, that the recorded action was applied to

columns.name: ObjectSize
columns.description: Size of the object in bytes

columns.name: IsHidden
columns.description: Indicates whether the user has marked the content as hidden (True) or not (False)

columns.name: ActivityId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the activity log

columns.name: ActionType
columns.description: Type of activity that triggered the event

columns.name: SensitiveInfoTypeInfo
columns.description: Details of Data Loss Prevention sensitive info types detected in the impacted asset

columns.name: SensitivityLabelId
columns.description: The current Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity label ID associated with the item

columns.name: SharepointSiteSensitivityLabelIds
columns.description: The current Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity label ID assigned to the parent site of the item related to SharePoint activities

columns.name: PreviousSensitivityLabelId
columns.description: The previous Microsoft Information Protection sensitivity label ID associated with the item in case of activities where the sensitivity label was changed

columns.name: Operation
columns.description: Name of the admin activity

columns.name: RecipientEmailAddress
columns.description: Email address of the recipient, or email address of the recipient after distribution list expansion

columns.name: SiteUrl
columns.description: The URL of the site where the file or folder accessed by the user is located

columns.name: SourceRelativeUrl
columns.description: The URL of the folder that contains the file accessed by the user

columns.name: TargetFilePath
columns.description: Target file path of endpoint activities

columns.name: PrinterName
columns.description: List of printers involved in the behavior

columns.name: Workload
columns.description: The Microsoft 365 service where the event occurred

columns.name: IrmActionCategory
columns.description: A unique enumeration value indicating the activity category in Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management

columns.name: SequenceCorrelationId
columns.description: Details of the sequence activity

columns.name: CloudAppAlertId
columns.description: Unique identifier for the alert in Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
